snippet: Toys “R” Us reported stronger holiday sales despite intense competition from online retailers such as Amazon.com.
abstract: Toys 'R' Us reports sales at stores rose 2 percent over holidays, compared to previous year, despite intense competition from online retailers.
lead_paragraph: Toys “R” Us reported stronger holiday sales despite intense competition from online retailers such as Amazon.com.

headline.main: Stronger Sales Suggest Progress at Toys ‘R’ Us
headline.print_headline: Stronger Sales Suggest Progress at Toys ‘r’ Us
